title: Public Landing Page (Filament + Tailwind)
description: Implement a minimal, fast landing page using Tailwind and Filament v3 components. Includes header with brand, category links to /listings?category={slug}, CTA 'LIST ITEM', Help modal, Featured listings grid, Stats (totals), Testimonials, and Footer. Clicking a listing requires registration/login.

queries: Stats: totals via cached aggregates (counts + sum of escrow released)

deliverables: Responsive landing page with all sections
Auth gate on listing detail (redirect to /register if guest)
acceptance_tests: Guest sees landing sections and clicking a listing redirects to /register
LIST ITEM CTA redirects guests to /register and authed users to /listings/create
Stats show real values and update when cache clears
Page is CLS-safe and passes Lighthouse perf >= 90
dependencies: Filament v3 installed and Tailwind configured
Auth scaffolding (phone-first) in place or placeholder routes
risks: Filament components in public panelâ€”styling drift
Phone-first auth flow not finalized may affect redirects
